data.eml:eml: Thraulodes bonito sp. nov. (Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Rio de Janeiro State, Southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gonçalves, Inês Corrêa, Da-Silva, Elidiomar Ribeiro, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz (2013): Thraulodes bonito sp. nov. (Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Rio de Janeiro State, Southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3669 (2): 153-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.2.6
